documentation.text:
@dev Notarizes a file by storing its SHA-256 hash.
 @param _fileHash The SHA-256 hash of the file to be notarized.

@dev Verifies a file hash and returns its proof details.
 @param _fileHash The SHA-256 hash of the file to verify.

devdoc.details: This contract allows users to notarize files by storing their SHA-256 hash on the blockchain. This creates an immutable, timestamped proof of existence.

notarize(bytes32).details: Notarizes a file by storing its SHA-256 hash.

params._fileHash: The SHA-256 hash of the file to be notarized.

verify(bytes32).details: Verifies a file hash and returns its proof details.

params._fileHash: The SHA-256 hash of the file to verify.
